1.speaker: Resources/Mr_Pug.png
1.text:
MAYDAY, MAYDAY! Commander P. Ug speaking!
Does any- *zrkkk* -one hear *zrrk* me?
PLEASE *zrrrkkk* HELP *zrrk*

1.speaker: Resources/Mr_Trump.png
1.text:
HAHAHA! YOU THINK YOU CAN STOP ME!
I'm the Trumpinator!
I will destroy you like a mexican god!
Here, have a little taste of my army!

1.speaker: Resources/Mr_Pug.png
1.text:
WE MUST *zrrrrrrk* ELIMINATE THAT *zrrrrrkrkrkrkr* SCUM!!!
*ZRRRRRRK*
DO YOUR BEST SOLDIER
-Signal Lost-

1.speaker: Resources/instructor.png
1.text:
Go destroy every ship that crosses your path!
Press P if you need a pause and Arrow Up to buy a new Ship if you got the money!
